body: OK so this actually has a decent story, the girl who set up the gangrape got gangraped in revenge, then she called the cops on the orgy, lots of interesting plot points we don't usually see in NTR doujin.  shame we don't have the ending yet
not sure why I didn't read all the tags, gangrape is past my limit

@Ozire the masses like to dip their toes in anime only when something comes out that's widely accepted, otherwise they stay away because they're scared of people thinking poorly of them. When movies and anime like your name, demon slayer, and spirited away, that are widely acclaimed outside of the anime community, people who don't watch anime will watch them, really like them, and act like they're the best anime they've never seen simply because they're fairly good, and it's the only thing they've seen. Of course, the line that divides anime people and people that refuse to watch anime is starting to blur, as anime is becoming more and more accepted

i think ive just recognize this as a seperate story than YOUR NAME, its character design and looks are totally different....thats why its much more tolerable to me, like its just another state of the mill Ntr with similar story to YOUR NAME otherwise i would have smash my phone.....its quite good if you look at it from the guy's perspective and if you put it as mitsuhas perspective it would be quite frustrating...... if u disregard the fact that its ntr...the art is hot and is a good read but not a good fap... heck
